page.title: 10Tourism - Accomodation.
page.content: The accomodation available ranges from hotels with all facilities and fine views over the lake to small houses in a side street in Windermere taking visitors on a bed and breakfast basis. The Priory Hotel is situated on high ground between the village and the lake with views over the lake towards the Coniston and Langdale fells. It has 22 rooms with a choice of facilities - double rooms with toilet and shower at Â£27.50 per person per night; the same, but with a lake view, at Â£30; single rooms are also Â£30. These prices include breakfast. An evening meal costs Â£12.50, children are half price. Most people stay for about a week, and the main reason given for visiting the lakes is sight seeing and having a relaxing holiday.
